original: Blixt, Axel Efraim, redaktör. Var-berg, f. 25/10/00 i S. Hestra, Jönköp. 1., av Anders Johan B. o. Emma Blixt. G. 35 m. Wivi Johansson. Barn: Lennart f. 37, Christina 41, Anders 42. — Lantm:sk. 18-19, folkhögsk. 22. Med-arb. i tidn. Smålands Landsbygd i Vimmerby 22, omb :man i Skarab. länsorg. av bondeförb. 25-29, medarb. i Smålandsbygdens Tidn. i Jör^köp. 29, omb :man i Södermani. länsorg. av bondeförb. samt medarb. i tidn. Sörmlandsbygden 30, red. o. ansv. utg. av Norra Hallands Veckoblad i FCungs-backa 31, förest, o. red. f. Hallands Nyheters redaktion i Varberg sed. 31
translated: Blixt, Axel Efraim, editor. Varberg, born on October 25th, 1900 in S. Hestra, Jönköping County, son of Anders Johan B. and Emma Blixt. Married in 1935 to Wivi Johansson and had three children: Lennart, born in 1937, Christina, born in 1941, and Anders, born in 1942. He studied lantmäteri (land surveying) from 1918-1919 and folkhögskola (adult education) in 1922. He worked as a cooperative member in the newspaper Smålands Landsbygd in Vimmerby in 1922, was a representative for Skaraborg County of the Farmers' Association from 1925-1929, worked for Smålandsbygdens Tidning in Jönköping in 1929, was a representative for Södermanland County of the Farmers' Association, and worked for the newspaper Sörmlandsbygden in 1930. He became editor and responsible publisher of Norra Hallands Veckoblad in Kungsbacka in 1931 and was manager and editor of Hallands Nyheter in Varberg since 1931.

structured.name: Axel Efraim Blixt
structured.description: Axel Efraim Blixt was a Swedish editor born on October 25th, 1900 in S. Hestra, Jönköping County. He was the son of Anders Johan B. and Emma Blixt. He studied lantmäteri (land surveying) from 1918-1919 and folkhögskola (adult education) in 1922. Blixt had a long career in journalism and worked for various newspapers, including Smålands Landsbygd in Vimmerby, Smålandsbygdens Tidning in Jönköping, Sörmlandsbygden, Norra Hallands Veckoblad in Kungsbacka, and Hallands Nyheter in Varberg. Blixt was married to Wivi Johansson in 1935 and they had three children: Lennart, Christina, and Anders.
